item.title: 埃里森逼近马斯克成为世界首富
item.description: 甲骨文股价大涨约 43%，创下历史新高，使该公司有望加入万亿美元精英俱乐部，并使联合创始人拉里-埃里森（Larry Ellison）更接近世界富豪榜榜首。【原文：Oracle shares surged about 43% to a record high, putting the company on track to join the elite trillion-dollar club and propelling co-founder Larry Ellison closer to the top of the world's richest list.】

item.title: 聚焦：卡夫亨氏拆分可能为时已晚，无法抵御 MAHA 日益严重的威胁
item.description: 卡夫亨氏（Kraft Heinz）本月宣布将进行分拆，是对这家维尔维塔奶酪（Velveeta cheese）和亨氏番茄酱（Heinz ketchup）生产商迟来的承认，这家公司错过了消费者多年来对加工食品的偏离，而这一趋势在联邦政府和包括加利福尼亚州在内的各州的新一轮推动下正在加速。【原文：Kraft Heinz's announcement this month that it would split was a belated acknowledgment that the Velveeta cheese and Heinz ketchup maker had missed consumers' years-long shift away from processed foods, a trend that is now accelerating under a new push from the federal government and states including California.】

item.title: 甲骨文迈向 1 万亿美元俱乐部，科技股欢呼雀跃
item.description: 甲骨文公司股价周四上涨，在上一交易日创下历史新高的基础上再创新高，并提振了整个科技板块的股票，因其人工智能云业务收益飙升，该公司距离梦寐以求的万亿美元俱乐部越来越近。【原文：Oracle's shares rose on Thursday, adding to a record run in the previous session and lifting stocks across the tech sector, as the company inches closer to the coveted trillion-dollar club on soaring gains from its AI cloud business.】

item.title: 美国股指期货在关键通胀数据公布前表现低迷
item.description: 周四，美国股指期货低迷，因为在可能影响美联储货币政策走向的重要通胀数据公布之前，投资者倾向于保持观望。【原文：U.S. stock futures were subdued on Thursday as investors preferred to stay on the sidelines ahead of crucial inflation numbers that are likely to influence the Federal Reserve's monetary policy path.】

item.title: 因 ADNOC 计划获得欧盟特许经营权，Covestro 股价攀升
item.description: 路透社报道称，ADNOC 准备做出让步，以回应欧盟对其 147 亿欧元（172 亿美元）竞购 Covestro 的补贴调查，随后德国化学品制造商 Covestro 的股价周四上涨。【原文：Shares in German chemicals maker Covestro rose on Thursday after Reuters reported that ADNOC was preparing to make concessions in response to an EU subsidy investigation of its 14.7 billion euro ($17.2 billion) bid for Covestro.】

item.title: 默克公司因制药环境问题撤销实验室，英国捍卫投资记录
item.description: 周四，美国制药商默克公司（Merck）表示将放弃在伦敦新建一个研究中心，一个顶级行业游说团体也警告说，充满挑战的商业环境正在损害该行业的发展，在此之前，英国为其在吸引投资方面的记录进行了辩护。【原文：Britain defended its record on attracting investment on Thursday after U.S. drugmaker Merck said it was abandoning a new London research centre and a top industry lobby group warned a challenging business environment was hurting the sector.】

item.title: 意大利倍耐力公司将为汽车制造商阿斯顿-马丁提供网络轮胎技术
item.description: 英国跑车制造商阿斯顿-马丁（Aston Martin）与意大利倍耐力（Pirelli）公司周四在一份联合声明中表示，未来的汽车将采用倍耐力轮胎技术。【原文：British sportscar maker Aston Martin will adopt Cyber Tyre technology from Italy's Pirelli for future vehicles, the two companies said in a joint statement on Thursday.】

item.title: 雷-达里奥建议用黄金保护面临心脏病风险的美国市场
item.description: 桥水公司创始人、前首席执行官雷-达里奥（Ray Dalio）说，黄金可能是投资者免受债务负担过重的不健康市场影响的一种方式。【原文：Bridgewater founder and former CEO Ray Dalio says gold might be a way to shield investors from unhealthy markets, overburdened with debt.】

item.title: 摩根大通加大企业银行业务招聘力度，推动亚太地区增长
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase）的高级管理人员告诉路透社，作为推动地区增长的一部分，摩根大通正在加快亚太地区企业银行业务的招聘步伐，并计划在明年将员工人数增加 20%。【原文：JPMorgan Chase is accelerating hiring across its corporate banking business in the Asia Pacific region and aims to increase headcount by 20% next year as part of a regional growth push, senior executives told Reuters.】

item.title: 国际能源署：欧佩克+加息后世界石油市场将出现供应增加和过剩
item.description: 国际能源机构（International Energy Agency）周四表示，随着欧佩克+（OPEC+）成员国进一步增产以及来自该组织以外的供应量增加，今年世界石油供应量的增长速度将超过预期，并暗示2026年可能出现过剩。【原文：World oil supply will rise more rapidly than expected this year as OPEC+ members increase output further and supply from outside the group grows, the International Energy Agency said on Thursday, and implied that a surplus could grow in 2026.】

item.title: 消息人士称，凯雷、EQT、洪山等是星巴克中国的最终竞购者之一
item.description: 五位知情人士透露，全球投资公司凯雷集团（Carlyle Group）和 EQT，以及地区性投资公司洪山资本集团（HongShan Capital Group，HSG）和博裕资本（Boyu Capital），正在准备对星巴克中国业务的控股权提出最终收购要约。【原文：Global investment firms Carlyle Group and EQT, alongside regional players HongShan Capital Group (HSG) and Boyu Capital, are preparing final offers for a controlling stake in Starbucks' China operations, said five people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美国提议征收外包税令印度 IT 业紧张不安
item.description: 分析师和律师表示，印度庞大的 IT 行业面临着一段漫长的不确定时期，在美国就对使用外国外包服务的美国公司征收 25% 税收的提议进行辩论的同时，客户会推迟或重新谈判合同。【原文：India's massive IT sector faces a lengthy period of uncertainty with customers delaying or re-negotiating contracts while the U.S. debates a proposed 25% tax on American firms using foreign outsourcing services, analysts and lawyers said.】

item.title: 瑞士立法者因竞争力问题反推反洗钱法
item.description: 瑞士立法者正试图淡化政府提出的帮助防止金融犯罪的建议，称瑞士需要在全球跨境财富管理中保持竞争力，而竞争对手--包括新加坡和阿联酋--正在逐渐占据上风。【原文：Swiss lawmakers are seeking to water down government proposals to help prevent financial crime, saying the country needs to stay competitive in global cross-border wealth management where rival centres - including Singapore and the UAE - are gaining ground.】

item.title: 一年后，意大利联合信贷银行在德国商业银行身上留下印记
item.description: 联合信贷银行说服德国商业银行展开合并谈判的活动已经进行了一年，首席执行官 Andrea Orcel 克服德国反对意见的希望似乎依然渺茫。【原文：A year in to UniCredit's campaign to persuade Commerzbank to open merger talks, CEO Andrea Orcel's hopes of overcoming German opposition seem as distant as ever.】

item.title: 在人工智能模拟的美联储会议上，政治压力使董事会两极分化
item.description: 一次模拟美联储会议使用了以现实生活中的决策者为模型的人工智能代理，结果显示，政治压力使董事会成员在利率制定审议中出现了两极分化。【原文：A simulated Federal Reserve meeting that used artificial intelligence agents modeled on real-life policymakers showed political pressure polarised members of the board in their rate-setting deliberations.】

item.title: 早间竞标：甲骨文大涨，亚洲掀起人工智能热潮
item.description: Stella Qiu 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Stella Qiu】

item.title: 中国 "小红书 "应用程序遭网络空间管理部门处罚
item.description: 中国网络空间管理局周四在一份声明中说，该局传唤并处罚了中国社交媒体平台小红书，指责这款流行应用 "破坏互联网生态"。【原文：China's cyberspace authority summoned and penalised Chinese social media platform Xiaohongshu, accusing the popular app of "damaging the internet ecology", the regulator said in a statement on Thursday.】

item.title: 大多数经济学家表示，日本央行将在第四季度再次加息：路透调查
item.description: 在路透社的一项民意调查中，大多数经济学家表示，日本央行将在 10 月至 12 月间把关键利率上调至少 25 个基点，低于一个月前的近三分之二。【原文：The Bank of Japan will raise its key interest rate by at least 25 basis points in the October-December quarter, a majority of economists said in a Reuters poll, down from nearly two-thirds a month ago.】

item.title: 在关税转嫁影响下，预计 8 月份美国物价将广泛上涨
item.description: 由于汽油成本上升以及进口关税提高了部分商品的价格，8月份美国消费者通胀率可能有所上升，但上升速度可能不足以破坏美联储下周备受期待的降息。【原文：U.S. consumer inflation likely picked up in August as the cost of gasoline rose and tariffs on imports raised some goods prices, but the pace of increase would probably not be strong enough to derail a much-anticipated interest rate cut from the Federal Reserve next week.】

item.title: 日本央行发出上田放松刺激政策最后阶段的信号--卖出 ETF
item.description: 三位熟悉日本央行想法的消息人士称，日本央行正在确定一项卸载其持有的巨额风险资产的战略，其核心可能是在市场上逐步出售交易所交易基金（ETF）的计划。【原文：The Bank of Japan is firming up a strategy to unload its huge holdings of risky assets that will likely centre on a plan to gradually sell exchange-traded funds (ETF) in the market, said three sources familiar with its thinking.】

item.title: 区块链贷款公司 Figure 和支持者在美国首次公开募股中筹集到 7.875 亿美元资金
item.description: 稳定币发行商Figure Technology及其部分现有投资者周三在美国首次公开募股中募集了7.875亿美元，成为随着数字资产获得主流认可而进入公开市场的最新一家加密货币公司。【原文：Stablecoin issuer Figure Technology, along with some of its existing investors, raised $787.5 million in a U.S. initial public offering on Wednesday, becoming the latest crypto firm to tap public markets as digital assets gain mainstream acceptance.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，私募股权公司 GTCR 达成 48 亿美元收购 Zentiva 的交易
item.description: 据《金融时报》周三援引未具名消息人士的话报道，私募股权公司 GTCR 已达成一项 41 亿欧元（48 亿美元）的交易，从 Advent International 手中收购捷克仿制药制造商 Zentiva。【原文：Private equity firm GTCR has struck a 4.1 billion euro ($4.8 billion) deal to buy Czech generic drugmaker Zentiva from Advent International, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday, citing unidentified sources.】

item.title: 日本和台湾股市因科技股提振和美联储减息希望而刷新纪录
item.description: 日本和台湾股市周四创下历史新高，科技公司股价大涨，投资者押注美国通胀数据将表现良好，足以确保下周降息，年底前可能还会有两次降息。【原文：Japanese and Taiwanese shares set records on Thursday as technology companies rallied while investors wagered that U.S. inflation data will be well behaved enough to ensure an interest rate cut next week, and perhaps two more by year end.】

item.title: 美国需求疲软，经济走软，油价持平
item.description: 周四油价持平，较前一交易日有所降温，原因是美国需求疲软和广泛的供应过剩风险消除了对中东袭击和俄罗斯乌克兰战争的担忧。【原文：Oil prices were flat on Thursday, cooling from the previous session as weak demand in the United States and broad oversupply risks countered concern over attacks in the Middle East and Russia's war in Ukraine.】

item.title: Vantage 数据中心获得 16 亿美元投资以拓展亚太地区业务
item.description: Vantage Data Centers 周四表示，该公司已获得由 GIC 关联公司和阿布扎比投资局下属单位牵头的 16 亿美元投资，用于扩大亚太地区业务，包括在马来西亚购买一个数据中心园区。【原文：Vantage Data Centers said on Thursday it has secured a $1.6 billion investment led by an affiliate of GIC and a unit of Abu Dhabi Investment Authority to scale up Asia-Pacific operations, including the purchase of a data centre campus in Malaysia.】

item.title: LB 制药公司在美国首次公开募股中筹资 2.85 亿美元
item.description: 这家生物技术公司周三表示，LB 制药公司在美国首次公开募股中筹集了 2.85 亿美元，这是自今年 2 月以来生物技术公司首次大规模公开募股。【原文：LB Pharmaceuticals raised $285 million in its U.S. initial public offering, the biotech firm said on Wednesday, marking the first sizable biotech IPO since February.】

item.title: 中国内幕中国电动汽车技术如何重塑全球汽车设计
item.description: 2021 年，当奥迪高管第一次看到 Zeekr 001（一款具有欧洲美学风格的长程电动汽车）时，就给这个德国高端汽车品牌敲响了警钟--如果想与中国汽车竞争，就需要他们的技术。【原文：When Audi executives first saw the Zeekr 001 in 2021, a long-range electric vehicle with European aesthetics, it was a wake-up call for the premium German auto brand - if it wanted to compete with the Chinese, it needed their technology.】

item.title: 美元持稳，通胀数据和央行成为焦点
item.description: 美元在周四亚洲早盘时段企稳，此前美国工厂出厂价格意外下跌，增强了美联储下周降息的预期，交易员们也在等待当天晚些时候公布的美国消费者物价数据。【原文：The dollar stabilised in early Asian trading hours on Thursday after an unexpected drop in U.S. factory-gate prices bolstered expectations the Federal Reserve will cut rates next week and traders awaited U.S. consumer price data due later in the day.】

item.title: 联合太平洋公司首席执行官维纳表示诺福克南方公司的合并将获得批准
item.description: 联合太平洋公司首席执行官吉姆-维纳（Jim Vena）周三表示，他相信该铁路运营商与诺福克南方公司（Norfolk Southern）的合并交易将获得美国政府的批准。【原文：Union Pacific CEO Jim Vena said on Wednesday he was confident that the railroad operator would receive a merger approval from the U.S. administration over its deal with Norfolk Southern .】

item.title: 阿里巴巴寻求通过可转换债券融资 32 亿美元，以增强云计算能力
item.description: 中国阿里巴巴公司周四表示，该公司正寻求通过发行零息可转换债券筹集约 32 亿美元资金，以加强其云基础设施并拓展国际业务。【原文：China's Alibaba , is looking to raise about $3.2 billion in a zero-coupon convertible note offering to strengthen its cloud infrastructure and expand its international business, the company said on Thursday.】
